description: I build themed websites with a focus on intuitive and interactive UX design. To help people share their ideas with the world in a user-friendly way.

description: I enjoy doing research and learning new things to better understand the problems at hand and help making better informed decisions on what kinds of solutions to offer under given circumstances.
